ConfigurationGroup.title: Maximum Values
ConfigurationGroup.description: The maximum values for functions / data

MAX_ADDRESS_BOOK_ENTRIES.title: Address Book Entries
MAX_ADDRESS_BOOK_ENTRIES.description: Maximum address book entries a customer is allowed to have

MAX_DISPLAY_PAGE_LINKS.title: Page Links
MAX_DISPLAY_PAGE_LINKS.description: Number of 'number' links use for page-sets

MAX_DISPLAY_SPECIAL_PRODUCTS.title: Special Products
MAX_DISPLAY_SPECIAL_PRODUCTS.description: Maximum number of products on special to display

MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_PRODUCTS.title: New Products Module
MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_PRODUCTS.description: Maximum number of new products to display in a category

MAX_DISPLAY_UPCOMING_PRODUCTS.title: Products Expected
MAX_DISPLAY_UPCOMING_PRODUCTS.description: Maximum number of products expected to display

MAX_DISPLAY_MANUFACTURERS_IN_A_LIST.title: Manufacturers List
MAX_DISPLAY_MANUFACTURERS_IN_A_LIST.description: Used in manufacturers box; when the number of manufacturers exceeds this number, a drop-down list will be displayed instead of the default list

MAX_MANUFACTURERS_LIST.title: Manufacturers Select Size
MAX_MANUFACTURERS_LIST.description: Used in manufacturers box; when this value is '1' the classic drop-down list will be used for the manufacturers box. Otherwise, a list-box with the specified number of rows will be displayed.

MAX_DISPLAY_MANUFACTURER_NAME_LEN.title: Length of Manufacturers Name
MAX_DISPLAY_MANUFACTURER_NAME_LEN.description: Used in manufacturers box; maximum length of manufacturers name to display

MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_REVIEWS.title: New Reviews
MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_REVIEWS.description: Maximum number of new reviews to display

MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_REVIEWS.title: Selection of Random Reviews
MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_REVIEWS.description: How many records to select from to choose one random product review

MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_NEW.title: Selection of Random New Products
MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_NEW.description: How many records to select from to choose one random new product to display

MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_SPECIALS.title: Selection of Products on Special
MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_SPECIALS.description: How many records to select from to choose one random product special to display

MAX_DISPLAY_CATEGORIES_PER_ROW.title: Categories To List Per Row
MAX_DISPLAY_CATEGORIES_PER_ROW.description: How many categories to list per row

MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_NEW.title: New Products Listing
MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_NEW.description: Maximum number of new products to display in new products page

MAX_DISPLAY_BESTSELLERS.title: Best Sellers
MAX_DISPLAY_BESTSELLERS.description: Maximum number of best sellers to display

MAX_DISPLAY_ALSO_PURCHASED.title: Also Purchased
MAX_DISPLAY_ALSO_PURCHASED.description: Maximum number of products to display in the 'This Customer Also Purchased' box

MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_IN_ORDER_HISTORY_BO.title: Customer Order History Box
MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_IN_ORDER_HISTORY_BO.description: Maximum number of products to display in the customer order history box

MAX_DISPLAY_ORDER_HISTORY.title: Order History
MAX_DISPLAY_ORDER_HISTORY.description: Maximum number of orders to display in the order history page
